pwa.new_version_available: A newer version of the application is available. Load the new version ?

install.iosInstructions: To install this web app on your device, tap the Menu button and the 'Add to Home screen' button
install.question: Install on the device ?

menu.settings-reset.description: Reset all the settings to their original values
menu.logout.description: Log me out of the application

timeSignature.label: Time signature
timeSignature.tip: The time signature specifies the unit of time and the duration of the measure.

timeSignatureNbOfTimeUnits.label: Number of units
timeSignatureNbOfTimeUnits.tip: The number of time units in the measure.

timeSignatureTimeUnit.label: Unit√© de temps
timeSignatureTimeUnit.tip: The note shape for a beat.

chordDuration.label: Chord duration
chordDuration.tip: The duration of a chord in BPM (beats per minute).

chordDurationUnit.label: Duration unit
chordDurationUnit.tip: The duration unit of a chord.

chordWidth.label: Chord width
chordWidth.tip: The number of notes in a chord.

method.label: Creation method
method.tip: The method used to create a soundtrack.

bonnusTable.label: Random with bonus matrix
bonnusTable.tip: The chords are randomly selected with a bonus on each chord increasing its chance of being selected.

minBonus.label: Minimum required bonus
minBonus.tip: The minimum required bonus to allow the chord to be selected. A chord with a lower bonus cannot be selected.

doubleChord.label: Double harmony chord
doubleChord.tip: For the harmony track, double create the chord, so as to have two identical chords that follow each other.

reverseDissimilarChord.label: Reverse chord
reverseDissimilarChord.tip: If the chord is too dissimilar from its previous one then create a chord from a reversing of the previous one.

inpassingNote.label: In passing note
inpassingNote.tip: When choosing a note for a chord, tune the probability of choosing an in passing note.

nbSemiTonesAsInpassingNotes.label: In passing notes
nbSemiTonesAsInpassingNotes.tip: The number of semi-tones between two notes for them to be considered in passing.

nbSemiTonesAsNearNotes.label: Near notes
nbSemiTonesAsNearNotes.tip: The number of semi-tones between two notes for them to be considered near.

bonusMin.label: Bonus minimum
bonusMin.tip: If a minimum bonus is specified then ignore the notes that have a bonus lower than the minimum.

bonusRandom.label: Bonus random
bonusRandom.tip: The higher the random value, the less weight has the bonus and thus the more random the choice of a note.

tonality.label: Major tonality
tonality.tip: The tonality of the first measure.

generateOnlyMajorTonalities.label: Only major tonalities
generateOnlyMajorTonalities.tip: Modulate only on major tonalities while ignoring minor tonalities.

modulation.label: Modulation
modulation.tip: Tune the probability of having modulation from one tonality to another.

nbChords.label: Number of chords
nbChords.tip: The number of chords of the soundtrack.

melody.label: Melody track
melody.tip: Have a melody track when adding a new soundtrack.

harmony.label: Harmony track
harmony.tip: Have a harmony track when adding a new soundtrack.

drums.label: Drums track
drums.tip: Have a drums track when adding a new soundtrack.

bass.label: Bass track
bass.tip: Have a bass track when adding a new soundtrack.

melody.label: Melody
melody.tip: The notes velocity of the melody track.

harmony.label: Harmony
harmony.tip: The notes velocity of the harmony track.

drums.label: Drums
drums.tip: The notes velocity of the drums track.

bass.label: Bass
bass.tip: The notes velocity of the bass track.

tracks.label: Tracks
tracks.tip: The tracks to create when generating a new soundtrack.

velocity.label: Velocity
velocity.tip: The notes velocity allows for playing notes harder or not.

animatedStave.label: Animated stave
animatedStave.tip: Display part of the stave, animated in one row.

showKeyboard.label: Show the keyboard
showKeyboard.tip: A keyboard can be showed above the track stave.

showAllNotes.label: Show the names of all the notes
showAllNotes.tip: Show all the notes with their names on the stave.

allowDarkTheme.label: Automatic dark theme
allowDarkTheme.tip: Allow the automatic switch to the dark theme depending on the ambiant light.

form.title: Reset
form.statement: Reset all settings to their original values

message.added: The soundtrack {{ name }} has been added.
message.regenerated: The soundtrack {{ name }} has been regenerated.
message.maxNbReached: The maximum number of soundtracks is reached. Delete a soundtrack before adding one.
message.updated: The soundtrack {{ name }} has been updated.
message.deleted: The soundtrack {{ name }} has been deleted.
message.notFound: The soundtrack {{ name }} could not be found.

devices.title: Connected MIDI devices
devices.none: There are no plugged-in MIDI devices.

error.noSheetDrawing: The drawing of staves is no longer possible.

recreate.label: Recreate
recreate.tip: Recreate the soundtrack from this chord

recreate.label: Recreate
recreate.tip: Recreate the soundtrack from this note
